articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performance
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performance
Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed the "Concert Celebrating December Holiday" given by the State Merited Chorus.
					 He warmly waved back to the enthusiastically cheering audience and heartily congratulated them who are devoting themselves to the defence of the country and the prosperity of the socialist country, upholding the Songun revolutionary leadership of the party. 
					
					 Put on the  stage were colorful numbers including male chorus "Comrade Kim Jong Il Is Our Supreme Commander", female solo and male chorus "We Will Surely Come Back Holding the General in High Esteem" and male solo and chorus "Where Are You, Dear General?".
					
					 He highly appreciated the success made in the performance, expressing great satisfaction over the chorusâ€™s splendid concert rich in the ideological contents and high in artistry as it is replete with the faith and will of the DPRK and the revolutionary soldier spirit and extended thanks to all creators and artistes. 
					
					  He praised the artistes of the chorus for their feats, noting that it has creditably performed its sacred mission as buglers of the Songun era over the past 15 years since its first concert, imbuing all the servicepersons and people with ardent love for the party and the leader and the country and its people and indomitable confidence and will by singing revolutionary war songs.
					
					 He had taken a photograph with them.  
					
					Among the audience were Ri Yong Ho, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK and chief of the General Staff of the KPA, Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, Kim Yong Chun, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK, vice-chairman of the NDC and minister of the People's Armed Forces, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok and Hong Sok Hyong, members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, Kim Kyong Hui, member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, Kang Sok Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-premier of the Cabinet, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the NDC, Kim Jong Gak, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and first vice director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Thae Jong Su, and Kim Phyong Hae, alternate members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, Mun Kyong Dok, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK and chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, Ju Kyu Chang, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and department director of the C.C., the WPK, U Tong Chuk, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and member of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, Kim Kyong Ok, Kim Won Hong, Kim Myong Guk, Jong Myong Do, Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Yong Chol and Yun Jong Rin, members of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su, department directors of the NDC, commanding officers of the army, leading officials of the society and servicepersons of the KPA.

articles.title: DPRK Youth and Students Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Youth and Students Delegation Back Home 
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The DPRK delegation of youth and students came back home on Saturday after participating in the 17th World Festival of Youth and Students held in South Africa.
					 It was headed by Ri Yong Chol, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League. 
					
					 The delegation attended the closing ceremony of the festival on Dec. 21.
					
					 Prior to the ceremony, there was a peace march of the delegations of youth and students in the festival.
					
					 A final declaration of the festival was read out.
					
					 It called upon all the youth and students in the world to intensify the struggle against imperialism and positively conduct an international solidarity movement in support of the just struggle of the youth and other people in the DPRK to build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation and achieve the reunification of the country.
					
					 Speeches were followed by a joint art performance given by delegations of youth and students of the DPRK and other countries.

articles.title: CPRK Accuses S. Korea of Demanding Penalties for Rev. Han Sang Ryol
articles.content:
CPRK Accuses S. Korea of Demanding Penalties for Rev. Han Sang Ryol
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in information bulletin No. 970 Saturday blasted the south Korean regime for demanding heavy penalties for Rev. Han Sang Ryol who visited the DPRK on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration
					 The prosecution demanded 10 years in prison and 10 years of suspension of qualifications for him on charges of violation of the "National Security Law," the bulletin said, and continued:
					
					 This action is a wanton violation of justice and conscience and an intolerable challenge to the desire of the Koreans for reunification.
					
					 Han's visit to the DPRK was a patriotic deed prompted by his ardent desire and strong will for national harmony and reunification.
					
					 During his stay in the DPRK he met northerners of various circles, sharing compatriotic feelings. He ardently called on the Koreans to pool efforts to reject outside domination and moves for aggression and anti-reunification forces' sycophancy and treachery and confrontation with fellow countrymen. He also urged them to defend peace and achieve independent reunification under the banner of the north-south joint declaration.
					
					 This being a hard reality, the south Korean regime arrested him soon after he crossed Panmunjom on the charge that he visited the DPRK without its consent to conduct "illegal" and "enemy-benefiting" activities. It has put him to unbearable persecution for a long period. 
					
					 The south Korean regime's recent action disclosed its intention to opt for confrontation with the DPRK and war contrary to the desire of all the Koreans and the world public to see the north-south relations improved.
					
					 It should stand trial for its acts of division, confrontation and war.
					
					 The bulletin called upon the south Koreans and all other Koreans to strongly denounce the puppet forces for their suppression of pro-reunification forces, escalation of the confrontation with the DPRK and moves to launch a war.
					
					 It demanded the forces stop at once their actions to punish Rev. Han on groundless charges.

articles.title: 400-odd Light Industrial Bases Technologically Updated This Year
articles.content:
400-odd Light Industrial Bases Technologically Updated This Year
						
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The DPRK laid a springboard for making a big advance in light industry this year.
					 It set this year as a year of general offensive for bringing about a drastic change in improving the standard of people's living. 
					
					 Light industrial bases in Pyongyang were modernized while the foundations of those in provinces reinforced through a high-pitched drive for bringing about a radical turn in local industry.
					
					 A solid foundation of food industry was also laid.
					
					 The Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory was modernized as a big confectionery production base, tripling production capacity. The Pyongyang Flour Processing Factory was technologically updated in a matter of a few months. A similar turn took place in the Ryongsong Foodstuff Factory and the Sonhung Foodstuff Factory.
					
					 The Kangso Mineral Water Factory producing world famous tasty and quality mineral water was put on modern lines, increasing its production 10 times.
					
					  Such large-scale light industrial bases which have an important role to play in improving the standard of people's living as textile, knitting, footwear and daily necessities have been technologically updated to remarkably boost the production capacity.
					
					 Central light industrial foundations have been consolidated and there are taking place changes in the local industrial development, one of the important links in improving the standard of people's living.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il saw to it that Changsong County in North Phyongan Province took the lead in bringing about a radical turn in the local industry. The county is rapidly developing the local industry. Following its example cities and counties across the country are using all their potentials for modernizing local industrial factories, registering big successes.
					
					 It is a signal turn in the development of the nation's light industry that general special products processing bases like the Samilpho Special Products Factory made their appearances in every province of the country to go operational. 
					
					 Foodstuff processing bases have been technologically updated in provinces, cities and counties. They include more than 400 local industrial factories under the Ministry of Foodstuff and Daily Necessities Industry. 
					
					Great, indeed, is the potential of the light industry, a product of the persevering efforts made by the Korean people in the spirit of self-reliance this year.

articles.title: Meeting Showing Shortcut to Anti-Japanese War
articles.content:
Meeting Showing Shortcut to Anti-Japanese War 
Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Eighty years has passed since President Kim Il Sung convened a meeting of leading personnel of the Korean Revolutionary Army and heads of revolutionary organizations in Wujiazi, Huaide County, on December 25, Juche 19 (1930).
					The meeting was aimed to review the experience and lesson from the effort for implementing the policy advanced at the Kalun Meeting and take measures to make preparations for an armed struggle for the liberation of the country. 
					
					At that time the Japanese imperialists were bending all their energies to secure new colonies and expand their territory.
					
					The top agenda of the meeting was to invigorate anti-Japanese activities in east Manchuria.
					
					East Manchuria was adversely affected by a left adventuristic riot kicked up by factionalists and flunkies.
					
					Some of the people in the area resented and antagonized communists. 
					
					Such being a situation, it was urgent to take a proper step to invigorate activities in east Manchuria.
					
					Koreans amounted to about 80 percent of the population of the area, adjacent to Korea. 
					
					At the meeting Kim Il Sung called for restoring and expanding revolutionary organizations in the area and reactivating the revolutionary struggle in the area.
					
					He also underscored the need to prepare for an armed struggle against the Japanese imperialists and strengthen solidarity with international revolutionary forces.
					
					In his reminiscences "With the Century" Kim Il Sung said the Kalun Meeting reflected the Korean people's will to defeat the Japanese imperialists by force of arms and liberate the country and the Wujiazi Meeting reconfirmed the will and indicated a way for launching an anti-Japanese war as early as possible.

articles.title: US-S. Korea to Blame for Yonphyong Island Shelling
articles.content:
US-S. Korea to Blame for Yonphyong Island Shelling
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The Yonphyong Island shelling committed by south Korea was a blatant challenge to the desire of the Koreans and other people for detente and peace on the Korean Peninsula. It was, at the same time, a dangerous provocation aimed to aggravate the situation. Leading newspapers Saturday said in commentaries.
					 "The shelling conducted by south Korea was a deliberate and planned action to preserve the 'northern limit line' and bring a position for invading the DPRK close to its territory," said Rodong Sinmun.
					
					 "The shelling showed the Lee Myung Bak regime's intention to recover from a disgraceful setback it suffered in the previous provocation, save its policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen from failure and weather its worsening ruling crisis," the news analyst added.
					
					 The commentary blamed the U.S. for egging south Korea onto another Yonphyong shelling against the DPRK.
					
					 "By sparking off a military clash on the peninsula and pushing the situation to an extreme phase the U.S. imperialist warmongers seek to solve the pending issue of Futenma airfield and calm down south Koreans critical of the 'Free Trade Agreement'. They also seek to retain a tighter grip on south Korea, exercise their influence over Northeast Asia and recover from their setbacks in the standoff with the DPRK over the nuclear issue," the newspaper added.
					
					 "The U.S. deserves curse by the Korean and other peace-loving people as it is gravely threatening peace on the peninsula to achieve its aim for aggression and plunder. South Korea is equally to blame for perpetrating reckless actions which may bring the Koreans a nuclear disaster, while working as a war stooge for the U.S.," the commentary said.
					
					 A commentary of Minju Joson said that the recent Yonphyong shelling was a deliberate military provocation committed by south Korea at the instruction of its American master. It added that it was aimed to recover from the setbacks it sustained in the previous shelling and use counterstrike from DPRK as a pretext for igniting a war against it.
					
					 "Reckless actions of the Lee Myung Bak group would precipitate its self-destruction," the newspaper warned.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts Lee Myung Bak for Agitating Confrontation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts Lee Myung Bak for Agitating Confrontation
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak, while inspecting a forefront unit of the south Korean puppet armed forces in the eastern sector of the front on Dec. 23, let loose a whole string of provocative outbursts. He blustered that "it is necessary to make strong counteractions," "there is no need to be patient" but "merciless retaliation should be made," talking about someone's "provocation."  He made unspeakable accusations against the socialist government of the DPRK, terming it "bellicose."
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observed this in a signed commentary. 
					
					 It went on: 
					
					 What he uttered was the worst provocation to the DPRK and agitation of confrontation and war baffling human imagination. 
					
					 The war hysteria kicked up by Lee at the above-said unit of the puppet armed forces was designed to hype the story about someone's "provocation" in a bid to drive the situation on the Korean Peninsula to confrontation and war. 
					
					 The puppet warmongers have gone to extremes in their hysteria for a war of aggression against the DPRK. 
					
					 The prime minister of south Korea was recently reported to have cried out for "punishing" someone in an area on the frontline. The chief executive of south Korea let loose the above-said outbursts in the wake of his outpourings. This indicates that the south Korean conservative regime's dangerous military provocations and exercises for a war of aggression against the DPRK were premeditated anti-DPRK rackets kicked up according to the scenario and an extreme plan for confrontation provided by Lee. 
					
					 Lee's vociferation about "bellicose regime" only sounds like a jargon of the traitor standing isolated and facing destruction after being branded as a provocateur and war fanatic.
					
					 Lee had better cool his megrim-ridden head and behave himself.

articles.title: S. Korea Demands Heavy Penalties for Rev. Han Sang Ryol
articles.content:
S. Korea Demands Heavy Penalties for Rev. Han Sang Ryol
Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The puppet Seoul District Prosecutor's Office demanded ten years in prison and ten years of suspension of qualifications for pro-reunification champion Rev. Hang Sang Ryol on charges of the violation of the notorious "National Security Law", according to MBC of south Korea.
					The prosecutors charged that he visited the north without a prior consent of the "government" and praised the north while staying there and led the action for pulling down the statue of MacArthur in September 2005, sympathizing with the assertion of the north.
					
					In this connection various organizations of south Korea accused the prosecutors of demanding ten years in prison for Rev. Han Sang Ryol, a penalty unprecedented in the past decade. 
					
					The prosecutors brought against him charges of what they called "reception of instructions," taking issue even with his anti-U.S. and anti-war activities in the past, they noted, adding this is arousing great concern.

articles.title: Conversion of West Sea into Sea of Peace Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Conversion of West Sea into Sea of Peace Called for in S. Korea
Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations of south Korea held a candlelight rally before the Posin Pavilion in Seoul on Dec. 20 demanding the conversion of the West Sea of Korea into a sea of peace. The organizations include the Solidarity for Progress, the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification and the Solidarity of Youth.
					The speakers said that the recent shelling staged by the military authorities were, in fact, provocative acts to spark off an all-out war.
					
					We can no longer remain a passive onlooker to the escalating tension in the West Sea of Korea, they said. They called for setting up a special zone of peace and cooperation in the West Sea as early as possible as had been agreed upon in the October 4 declaration.
					
					They demanded the authorities stop the reckless war moves and opt for peace.

articles.title: Anniversaries of DPRK Marked in Uzbekistan
articles.content:
Anniversaries of DPRK Marked in Uzbekistan
Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- An event of Koreans in Uzbekistan was held on Dec. 19 on the occasions of the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's gaining of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 93rd birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 Present there were officials of the Commonwealth of Independent States Regional Committee of the Overseas Side to the Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration and Koreans in Uzbekistan.
					
					 Present on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to Uzbekistan and staff members of the DPRK embassy there. 
					
					 Speakers said that Kim Jong Il has channeled primary efforts into bolstering the national defence capability and firmly prepared the Korean People's Army as a matchless army capable of beating back any formidable enemy through his inspections of the front. 
					
					 Thanks to his commandership the DPRK has dynamically advanced along the road of socialism despite the moves of the imperialists to isolate and stifle it and demonstrated its might as an invincible state before the world, he stressed. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il unrolled a plan to build a thriving socialist nation in which the people will live with nothing to desire more in the world as wished for by Kim Jong Suk and has exerted every effort to materialize it. 
					
					 An art performance was given there.

articles.title: DPRK Anniversaries Observed Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK Anniversaries Observed Abroad
						
Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Meetings, seminars and film shows took place in Bangladesh, Poland, Russia, Egypt and India between Dec. 15 and 18. It was to celebrate the 19th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's gaining of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 93rd birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 Films shown included "Mt. Chilbo".
					
					 Kim Jong Il's gaining of the supreme commandership of the KPA helped the army and people of the DPRK frustrate the ambition of the U.S. for world domination and firmly defend the sovereignty of the country, said Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League.
					
					 He expressed belief that as desired by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Suk, the Korean people would build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation and surely achieve the reunification of the country under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as supreme commander of the KPA marked a special event in strengthening the KPA and ensuring peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia, said the chairman of the Egyptian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea.
					
					 Recalling that Kim Jong Suk took part in the anti-Japanese armed struggle for the liberation of the country in her early years and devotedly defended Kim Il Sung, he noted that she was an excellent woman revolutionary intensely loyal to the President.
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting in Poland.

articles.title: CMC del PTC y CDN de RPDC ofrecen banquete por 24 de diciembre
articles.content:
CMC del PTC y CDN de RPDC ofrecen banquete por 24 de diciembre
						
Pyongyang, 25 de diciembre (ATCC) -- La Comision Militar Central (CMC) del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el Comite de Defensa Nacional (CDN) de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ofrecieron el dia 24 un banquete en saludo al 19 aniversario del nombramiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					  Cuando aparecio en el salon de recepcion el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del PTC, Presidente del CDN de la RPDC y Comandante Supremo del EPC, todos los participantes le dieron el maximo honor, el mas cordial agradecimiento y la calurosa bienvenida.
					
					  El Dirigente respondio cordialmente a las entusiastas aclamaciones de los participantes y les felicito a ellos quienes luchan con abnegacion por la defensa de la patria y la prosperidad de la patria socialista en pleno acato a la direccion del partido sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun.
					
					En la ocasion participaron Ri Yong Ho, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico (BP) del Comite Central del PTC, vicepresidente de la CMC del PTC y jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC,           Kim Jong Un, vicepresidente de la CMC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del CDN, Choe Ryong Hae, miembro suplente del BP, miembro de la CMC del partido y secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Jong Gak, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC,  Ju Kyu Chang, miembro suplente del BP, miembro de la CMC del partido y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, U Tong Chuk, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y miembro de la CMC del partido, Kim Kyong Ok, Kim Won Hong, Kim Myong Guk, Jong Myong Do, Kim Yong Chol y Yun Jong Rin, miembros de la CMC del partido, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su, jefes de departamento del CDN de la RPDC y otros miembros directivos del EPC. 
					
					  Tambien fueron invitados Kim Ki Nam y Choe Thae Bok, miembros del BP y secretarios del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, miembro del BP y jefa de departamento del CC del PTC, Kang Sok Ju, miembro del BP del CC del PTC y viceprimer ministro del Consejo de Ministros, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Pak To Chun, Thae Jong Su y Kim Phyong Hae, miembros suplentes del BP y secretarios del CC del PTC, Mun Kyong Dok, miembro suplente del BP y secretario del CC del PTC y secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Ciudad de Pyongyang y otros funcionarios directivos de la sociedad.
					
					  En la recepcion hizo uso de la palabra el jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, Ri Yong Ho.
					
					  Los participantes brindaron por la salud del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: CRPP condena a la banda de los titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
CRPP condena a la banda de los titeres surcoreanos
						
Pyongyang, 25 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) publico el dia 25 la informacion no. 970 condenando la banda de los titeres surcoreanos que imputo la pena grave al pastor Han Sang Ryol.
					    Segun la informacion, hace poco, la banda de los titeres surcoreanos imputo penas de 10 anos de presidio e igual periodo de suspension de la calificacion en virtud de transgresion de la "ley de seguridad" al pastor Han Sang Ryol, personalidad de reunificacion quien realizo una visita a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  Esto es la flagrante violacion a la justicia y conciencia y un desafio imperdonable sobre la aspiracion de los coreanos a la reunificacion.
					
					  La visita a la RPDC realizada por el con motivo del 10o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio no puede ser jamas delito siendo conducta patriotica que partio de la ardiente aspiracion y la voluntad a la armonia y la reunificacion.
					
					  Durante su visita a la RPDC, Han compartio el sentimiento consanguineo con los compatriotas de distintos estratos de la parte Norte y les exhorto ardientemente a rechazar con las fuerzas unidas de la nacion la dominacion y las maniobras agresivas de las fuerzas extranjeras y los actos serviles a grandes potencias y la confrontacion fratricida de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion, defender la paz del pais y lograr la reunificacion independiente bajo la bandera de la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur.
					
					  Sin embargo, la banda de los titeres le arresto brutalmente tan pronto como el paso la linea divisora de Phanmunjom insistiendo en que este visito sin "aprobacion" a la RPDC y perpetro actos "ilegales" y "pro-enemigos". Al cabo de intolerables vejamenes de largo plazo, le condeno a dura pena. 
					
					Tales hechos demuestran claramente la malsana intencion de la banda de traidores de marchar hasta el final por el camino de enfrentamiento y de guerra contra la RPDC nadando a contrapelo de las opiniones internas y externas y de toda la nacion, que demandan el mejoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					La banda de titeres, que da espaldas a la reunificacion y el patriotismo y maniobra desesperadamente para la division, la confrontacion y la guerra, es precisamente el blanco de sentencia de la nacion a ser interrogado por sus crimenes.
					
					Los surcoreanos y otros compatriotas de distintos estratos en ultramar deben condenar fuertemente a la banda de traidores titeres que reprime las personalidades patrioticas pro-reunificacion incluso el pastor Han Sang Ryol y recurre locamente al enfrentamiento y campana de guerra contra la RPDC.
					
					La banda de traidores titeres debe parar ahora mismo el injusto castigo sobre el pastor Han.

articles.title: Rubricado protocolo entre los gobiernos de Corea y China
articles.content:
Rubricado protocolo entre los gobiernos de Corea y China
Pyongyang, 25 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Quedo firmado el dia 24 en Beijing el protocolo de la 44? sesion de la Comision de Cooperacion cientifico-Tecnica entre los gobiernos de  la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y de la Republica Popular China.
					En la ceremonia de firmas estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana los miembros de la delegacion cientifico-tecnologica gubernamental encabezada por el vicepresidente del Comite Estatal de Ciencias y Tecnologias, Choe Sang Gon, y el ministro de la embajada coreana en China, y por la china, el viceministro de Ciencia y Tecnologia y otros funcionarios.

articles.title: Periodicos revelan la peligrosidad de fuego astillero en la isla Yonphyong
articles.content:
Periodicos revelan la peligrosidad de fuego astillero en la isla Yonphyong
						
Pyongyang, 25 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Al difundir comentarios individuales en sus ediciones de este sabado, los periodicos centrales condenaron el fuego artillero en los alrededores de la isla Yonphyong, cometido por los titeres surcoreanos, calificandolo del desafio frontal a la unanime demanda del interior y exterior del pais que aspiran al alivio de la tension entre el Norte y el Sur y a la paz de la Peninsula Coreana, y de una provocacion aventurera para empeorar la situacion.
					El presente caso es una maniobra premeditada de los titeres surcoreanos para establecer cerca del territorio de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea la posicion de partida de ataque contra esta defendiendo la "linea de limite al Norte", perturbar la paz y agravar la tension en la Peninsula Coreana, senala el comentarista del diario Rodong Sinmun y prosigue:
					
					Tambien, tal canonazo demostro a todo el mundo la intencion criminal de la banda de Lee Myung Bak de recuperarse de su derrota vergonzosa en la primera provocacion en esa isla, mantener la politica de confrontacion fratricida en la ruptura total y salvarse de la crisis de dominacion cada dia mas agravante. 
					
					Estados Unidos instigo el presente fuego astillero. 
					
					Los belicistas norteamericanos pretenden provocar un conflicto armado en la Peninsula Coreana y llevar a la fase extremada la situacion para solucionar el polemico problema del aeropuerto de Futenma de Japon y apaciguar el clima contra el "Convenio de Comercio Libre" en el Sur de Corea. 
					
					Ademas, tratan de ampliar su influencia en el Nordeste Asiatico manejando a su antojo a los titeres surcoreanos y recuperarse de la derrota en la confrontacion nuclear con la RPDC. 
					
					Tanto los imperialistas yanquis, que amenazan gravemente la paz de la Peninsula Coreana para realizar sus intereses agresivos y saqueadores, como los titeres surcoreanos, que sin darse cuenta de esa malsana intencion de EE.UU., se entregan a los imprudentes actos que puedan acarrear los desastres nucleares a la nacion coreana sirviendo de lacayo de guerra del imperio, son los criminales a ser repudiados por la nacion coreana y los demas pueblos del mundo amantes de la paz.
					
					El rotativo Minju Joson denuncia que el fuego astillero en la isla Yonphyong fue una provocacion militar intencional, que cometieron los belicistas surcoreanos bajo el mando de su amo norteamericano con el fin de recuperarse de la derrota en el primer choque armado en dicha isla y desatar la guerra de agresion contra la RPDC induciendola a dar el contraataque.
					
					Advierte a la banda de Lee Myung Bak que sus imprudentes actos le llevaran al arruinamiento.

articles.title: Trampolin para el desarrollo vertiginoso de la industria liger
articles.content:
Trampolin para el desarrollo vertiginoso de la industria ligera 
						
Pyongyang, 25 de diciembre (ATCC) --  Este ano de la ofensiva general para registrar un cambio decisivo en la mejora de la vida del pueblo, en Corea se ha preparado el trampolin para el desarrollo vertiginoso de la industria ligera. 
					Se han acondicionado modernamente las bases centrales de la industria ligera y se fortalece el fundamento de la industria local.
					
					Se logran exitos en la industria alimentaria.
					
					La capacidad productiva de la Fabrica de Elaboracion de Cereales de Pyongyang se ha elevado en mas de tres veces mediante la modernizacion. Durante unos meses se han transformado completamente la Fabrica de Elaboracion de Harina de Trigo de Pyongyang y las Fabricas de Alimentos de Ryongsong y de Sonhung.
					
					La modernizada Fabrica de Aguas Minerales de Kangso ha aumentado a 10 veces la produccion de agua mineral de Kangso de fama mundial tanto en su sabor como en su calidad. 
					
					Las bases de produccion de tejidos, zapatos, articulos de uso diario y otros productos de la industria ligera de gran dimension que cumplen un rol importante en la mejora de la vida del pueblo ampliaron capacidades de produccion mediante la renovacion tecnica. 
					
					Por otra parte, se registran saltos en el desarrollo de la industria local, uno de los importantes eslabones en la solucion del problema de la vida del pueblo.
					
					En esta labor esta al frente el distrito de Changsong de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte. Y otras ciudades y distritos movilizan todas sus potencialidades a la modernizacion de las fabricas de industria local. 
					
					En todas las provincias se han levantado los combinados de procesamiento de productos especiales al estilo "Samilpho", lo cual es una revolucion en el desarrollo de la industria ligera del pais.
					
					En las provincias, ciudades y distritos del pais se reconstruyeron magnificamente las bases de procesamiento de alimentos. Mas de 400 fabricas de industria local adscritas al Ministerio de la Industria Alimentaria y de Necesidades Diarias lograron la renovacion tecnica.
					
					Tal potencialidad de la industria ligera es el fruto de la lucha del pueblo coreano con el espiritu de apoyo en sus propias fuerzas.
